Description of the Problem: Project timelines are not syncing with JIRA. Possible Cause: Incompatible PHP 8.0 version. Actions Taken: Reinstalled Puppet and restarted the server My name is Elena Ivanova.. I am contacting you for help to resolve this issue You can reach me at david.kim@corp.kr.. Would you be able to provide guidance on how to troubleshoot or fix this problem?
